headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Expanding Venezuelan Crude Runs Ahead of Earnings
summary: Marathon Petroleum recently announced it will host a conference call on February 3, 2026, to review its 2025 fourth‑quarter and full‑year financial results, with materials and a replay made available on its website. At the same time, the company’s large Garyville refinery in Louisiana is positioned to process more Venezuelan heavy crude, underpinned by strong recent refining margins and high utilization rates. We’ll now examine how Marathon’s ability to capture additional Venezuelan heavy...
